channel.title: papers on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in papers on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current researches are: Cavicchia, C. and Vichi, M. Second-order Disjoint Factor Analysis a new latent factor model called Second-order Disjoint Factor Analysis in order to model an unknown hierarchical structure of the manifest variables with two orders. This is an second-order factor analysis, which - respect to the second-order confirmatory factor analysis - is exploratory, nested and estimated simultaneously by maximum likelihood method. A cyclic block coordinate descent algorithm is proposed to maximize the likelihood.

item.title: publications
item.description: journal articles Cavicchia, C. and Sarnacchiaro, P. A multi-group higher-order factor analysis for studying the gender-effect in Teacher Job Satisfaction METRON, (2021) Cavicchia, C., Sarnacchiaro, P. and Vichi, M. A composite indicator for the waste management in the EU via Hierarchical Disjoint Non-Negative Factor Analysis Socio-Economic Planning Sciences, 73, (2021) Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. The ultrametric correlation matrix for modelling hierarchical latent concepts
